description: Repository with multiple branches (master, develop, feature-payments, feature-notifications, release-1.0) and four contributors with varying activity across branches. Tests git-fame's ability to correctly analyze authorship across complex branching patterns and merge histories.

summary.description: 10 Python files across main, features/, and utils/ directories, ~570 LOC total

concentration_metrics.description: Moderate-to-low concentration depending on how git-fame handles merged branches

branching.description: Tests that merged branch contributions are correctly attributed

risk_indicators.description: Moderate bus factor risk - Alice contributes slightly more but ownership is reasonably distributed

thresholds.description: Slightly longer analysis time due to multiple branches and merge history
